sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GetProducerSetReferenceFields</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GetProducerSetReferenceFields</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GetProducerSetReferenceFields = Class.create();
GetProducerSetReferenceFields.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	process : function(tableName) {
		var referenceFields = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		if (!gr.isValid())
			return referenceFields;
		
		var elements = gr.getElements();
		for (var elemIndex=0; elemIndex < elements.size(); elemIndex++) {
			var element = elements.get(elemIndex).getED();
			if (element.getInternalType() == 'reference')
				referenceFields.push(element.getName());
			
		}
		return referenceFields;
	},

    type: 'GetProducerSetReferenceFields'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-14 17:04:55</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7220ae6077560110bc988a559f5a99ff</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GetProducerSetReferenceFields</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog - Composite Record Producer" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.composite_record_producer">077b7c243c35311068bcf327dfe37fb8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7220ae6077560110bc988a559f5a99ff</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-22 16:54:00</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
